Learnosity Quick Start Examples

Authoring examples

  • Author aide

    Create and translate questions using AI

  • Authoring Items

    Create and edit Items for your Item bank.

    Each Item can contain one or more Questions, as well as interactive Features like calculators and protractors.

  • Authoring Activities

    Group your Items into assessment Activities. Activities are also stored in the Item bank.

Assessment examples

  • Standalone assessment

    Embed an assessment Activity into a web page, where a learner can attempt the test.

Analytics examples

  • Student reporting

    View the results from an assessment Activity.

  • Basic data extraction

    Pull some specific data from the system with Data API.

  • Paginated data extraction

    Example of how to work with large datasets in Data API that return paginated results. Learn more.

Tutorial Links

The examples on this page are described in detail at these tutorial documentation pages:

  • Quick Start Guide for Authoring
  • Quick Start Guide for Assessment
  • Quick Start Guide for Analytics
  • Reference for Data API and the SDK
